Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a blistering unbeaten 122 off just 61 balls
Bhuvneshwar Kumar bowled one of the best spells in Twenty20 cricket by grabbing 5-4
India won by a massive 101 runs
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli dedicated his century to his wife Anushka Sharma and their daughter Vamika
Mohammad Nabi conceded that Afghanistan was mentally unprepared for the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kohli hit 12 fours and six sixes
Ibrahim Zadran top-scored with a gritty unbeaten 64
Rahul and Kohli provided India a rollicking start of 119 runs off 76 balls
